name: Annual Meeting & Expo on Acupuncture and Alternative Medicine
content: Annual Meeting & Expo on Acupuncture and Alternative Medicine is going to be held in St. Louis Missouri, USA during August 25-26, 2020\. Acupuncture 2020 focus to gather leading academic scientists, researchers and research students, business delegates to exchange & share their experiences and research findings about all aspects of Acupuncture & Alternative Medicine. On behalf of Advisory Committee, we cheerfully welcome Acupuncturists, established researchers, specialists, advisors, educators, understudies and business agents to attend the Annual Meeting & Expo on Acupuncture and Alternative Medicine. The conference deliberations will be carried under the theme Acupuncture & Alternative Medicine as solutions to healthcare crisis.
